Revised by Amy Lau, Archivist, to remediate oppressive language from abstract note.
Brooklyn Historical Society
Samuel Jackson will
Jackson, Samuel
1977.548
0.01 Linear Feet in one folder.
1728 Last will and testament of Samuel Jackson of Hempstead in Queens County, the Province of New York. The will is dated April 22, 1728 and contains a reference to an enslaved Black person. A0071
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date (if known); Samuel Jackson will, 1977.548, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Source and date of acquisition unknown. Formally accessioned in 1977.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to users without restriction.
Processing Information
Oppressive descriptive language was remediated from the abstract note in this finding aid as part of an anti-racist descriptive language audit performed in December 2020.
